name: Dejado Atras
description:
There is nothing left of this place but rubble and ruin. Majestic creatures of another world have brought the annihilation of civilisation.  You are one of the Lost, the people of before, who roam the barren land plagued by oblivion. You set out on your path to find out what once was and what will inevitably be.

The first steps of a setting based on memories and their power.
